reviews.review: I quite enjoy the concept of a single player experience in Counter Strike, and i enjoy Condition Zero. Its not a mind-blowing adaptation to the series, but its fun for people who are looking for a more casual, solitary, Counter Strike experience.
turns out gaben hacked this game watch out he wants your undies
I thought this was cs 1.6 with more detailed textures but it isn't and I like it, its unique.

CS 1.6 with multiplayer and a campaign.
CS 1.6 gameplay but much easier, medium is highly easy to beat. The bot AI is still pretty good, so matches are semi-realistic. A solid title when bored but not for everyone. 83%
